activities: The information is used by Configure One Inc. to respond to inquiries, supply requested information on Configure One Inc. products and services, or track orders.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data, including manually processed data
recoursemech:
We encourage client’s to raise any concerns using the contact information provided and we will investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordingly. 

If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using PrivacyTrust Services as a third party resolution provider. You can reach PrivacyTrust complaint system at http://www.etrust.org/complaint/raise_privacy_complaint.php.
